title: All-Star Hexakill Results – U.R.F. Mode Revealed!

replies.body: YALL BETTER BRING BACK DAT URF TO US NORMAL PEOPLE

isn't that from CoD?
Isn't that a type of fish?
I ordered pizza from there last night!
There is at least one person here who enjoys Dominion. Loved URF, but don't take away Dominion. So no, not "everyone".
There's nothing wrong with saying most people would (that's simply a fact), but those of us who disagree would appreciate it if we weren't simply treated as "no one."
Then there's people who play Hide and Seek, too, so Dominion shouldn't be taken away.
But dominion is balanced... Compared to giving everyone the same buffs.
singed isn't. {{item:3070}} {{champion:27}} {{item:3070}}
